doc.title: Black Tide
doc.plot: A heroic leader of a black ops security group who works daily to save the world. A dangerous new mission lures him to discover that he is actually from ancient Atlantis where he was the Atlanteans most powerful enemy, leading an army of Draconian Warriors against them in the battle that caused the destruction of their continent. Following clues, he discovers a fantastic former life and great love, wiped from his memories - and Atlantis - present-day - secretly recreated and thriving, hidden from mankind. Unfortunately, for him, that is just the beginning.
